reviews.review: mashallah gute wenn du nicht schnell tiltest

it is very good game to play with your friends and it is very fun to play. it need skills to play this game like controlling the spray of the guns and what not. one thing that i like about this game its their skins as they have a lot of skins that are awesome and one thing i hate about this game is that it has a lot of toxic people in the game...therefore i think that u should try out this game and i swear it can be very fun
yeah I will recommend this game. as a noob this game is fun and great to enjoy with friends

Well, the beggining may be kinda rough...
But if you take interest in how to play, how to shoot and learn all the techniques, the game will become much easier, more satisfying and more fun. You need to practice and work in this game to be better, and if you come to play this game just for the skins, you should not play it and you might as well leave, because this game is not about the skins, its about playing and enjoying it with friends or just for playing alone, because with the voice chat you will never get lonely.
кс говно, но я ее люблю
